content: $(window).on('load', resetMMoffers);    $(document).on('menu.reinit', resetMMoffers);    function resetMMoffers() {        var offersInclude = $('.mobile-category-offers-include');					        offersInclude.each(function(){            var offers = $(this).parents('li').find('.category-offer-slot').html();            $(this).html(offers);        });    }
